title: Adsorptive denitrogenation of model fuel with silica gel
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00574K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Peipei Wang, Jian Liu, Difan Zhang, Daniel Chambers, Shuyun Li, Daniel Santosa
The results establish the adsorption capacity, kinetics, interaction strength of pyridine/indole with sorbents and regeneration, highlighting silica gel's potential as an efficient and cost-effective adsorbent for biofuel nitrogen compounds removal.
